website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use and great for mud, dirt, and chemical removal on the green.
pros: Can be used wet or dry
some owners use the same one for several years of regular golf
Price is affordable, and two towels are included in the pack
cons: Best to wet the towel before every round, which may feel like an inconvenience to some players
Dry cleaning may be a little more difficult due to weaker grip

customer_reviews.title: Great during Covid 19
customer_reviews.text: I had a partner who has used this product for 15 years. I made fun of him, because I said I could just use a ball washer. But with the virus all around us and not wanting to touch things, I have found this as an awesome purchase. It stays wet for the entire round and cleans the ball petty well. I hope some day I can just go back to the ball washers, but for now I carry this in the cart and clean ball as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best golf ball cleaner I have used
customer_reviews.text: I love these golf ball cleaners. They remain wet enough for an entire round of golf that I don't have to add any more water to them and they don't get my pocket wet. I do have to wash them with a tiny amount of hand soap every so often but no problem. Unfortunately they do fall out of my pocket and I have lost a couple but still a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Don't play without it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Ballzee Pocket Ball Towel for several years now. In fact, I still have my first one and it is in use today. Sturdy, well made - and does what it advertises. Cleans your golf ball. A quick wet of the inside towel material before starting your round - and you will have a clean ball on the green whenever you need one. I recently bought several more for friends. Raves from all of them. Thanks for a great product that really does what is says it does!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck F

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Have This
customer_reviews.text: If your a golfer this is a must have!! This product works great. I carry it in my back pocket and every time I get on the green I clean my ball before putting. It does a great job of cleaning my ball and I can't remember the last time I used a ball cleaner on the course, this works that well!! For the price and what it does for you, you can't beat this.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: These things WORK!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why more people don't use these. Get it wet at the beginning of your round and it'll stay wet all day. If you give it a little shake before you stick it in your pocket, your pants will stay dry. REALLY NEAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: justaguy

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean my golf balls since there are no ball washer out at the golf courses. It works fine. Make sure you dry it our between uses as it can get smelly if you just put it away. Compact and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Canuck

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: Initially got these as a gift a few years ago. Didn't use them at first as I thought they were gimmicky BUT then I gave them a try & have bought a few more packs in the years since. Great to clean golf balls on the course. Goes back into your pocket without any mess.
customer_reviews.author: ccs93Top Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: This will change the future of the world as we know it!
customer_reviews.text: Truly the most dynamic invention of this century... Actually is a little plastic flappy gizmo with some absorbent material in the middle. If your balls get muddy you can use this to clean them off. Actually, I have used these for years... They wear decent, clean your ball adequately and keep your pocket dry. No more recrimination from the little lady when she opens the trunk and discover that foul smelling, moldy, rigid golf towel that's been fermenting for the last year.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dad
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my dad as a gift and he is super happy! He lost the last set that he had and was stoked for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: jpc1973

customer_reviews.title: Ballzee Pocket Ball Towel....
customer_reviews.text: I just received the two pack I ordered. After 3 years of service, my old Ballzee was pretty much shot. Still working but on its way out! I golf twice a week, so the life of Ballzee is outstanding. Now I have another new one and a back up as well. Can't beat the performance or the price. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharkmarina

customer_reviews.title: You'll find it handy
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to have in your back pocket when you reach the green and realize your ball has some dirt on it. Unless you have a caddie to toss the ball to or brought a wet towel out on the green with you then you'll be glad to have the Ballzee with you.
customer_reviews.author: Micky D

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful
customer_reviews.text: Albeit a great value for the money not sure if this is a necessary thing. It kinda absorbed water and was just awkward to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mata

customer_reviews.title: Never play golf without them
customer_reviews.text: If you are obsessed with playing a clean ball, always take one of this out on the course. Folds flat and keeps interior cloth moist for a full round. Easy to use and handle, even with winter gloves on.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: great to clean golf balls as the ball washers on the course have been removed due to COVID19.
customer_reviews.author: theodore Richard

customer_reviews.title: Best golf accessory ever
customer_reviews.text: Best golf accessory I've every bought. Easily cleans golf balls with minimal effort. Design keeps pocket dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless, don’t waste your money. Too small to clean a golf ball, cheap vinyl construction that’s not very flexible. The sides are open so it’s not like pouch that you can actually put a golf ball in. One wad of mud and it’s done for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Amols

customer_reviews.title: Simple and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product which I recommend highly to all golfers. Compact and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Worman

customer_reviews.title: Just jude a towel
customer_reviews.text: I mean just use a towel... it'll work as we and you probably have several.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's to do. Stays wet for 17 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Gatoboy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work. A little hard to hold onto while cleaning ball.
customer_reviews.author: Mackie

customer_reviews.title: Useful Item.
customer_reviews.text: Use these all the time. Easy to use, and do a good job. Only problem? Sometimes, when I've finished a round, they forget to get out of the cart. Have had to purchase them several times, because of their forgetfulness.
customer_reviews.author: Gumby26

customer_reviews.title: Handy gadget
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can just put this item in my pocket to clean my golf ball versus having to carry a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Leander

customer_reviews.title: Clean & sanitized balls
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat having your balls cleaned! I spray sanitizing liquid on mine pre round and then spray and clean after I pick up from putt after it goes in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: j.m

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. This is basically a folded plastic sheet with a thin towel glued to it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd C.

customer_reviews.title: Too cheap and poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and not worth the money. There is a thin layer of felt which does not hold the water very well and not very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Irby

customer_reviews.title: May have to wet it a couple times during your round.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for the last six years and they work great! Beats having to carry a wet rag/towel onto the green! Conveniently fits in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic! Bought 3 others for my golfing buddies! Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Had previously ordered it and lost one on a course. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dobri J Stojsic

customer_reviews.title: Useful golf item
customer_reviews.text: The Ballzee is great for making sure your golf ball is clean and rolls smoothly on greens after being hit all the way down the fairway to finally reach the green. It ensures that the ball does not take an unexpected turn after hitting the perfect putt. I love having this in my bag so that I can make sure my ball is clean for every putt!
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: a stiff piece of vinyl with insufficient cleaning fabric
customer_reviews.text: it is too stiff to nicely wrap around the ball and has too little fuzz/nap to clean effectively. spend your money elseswhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning tne ball before putting as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for many years and won't tee off without it. Great for cleaning tne ball before putting as well as the club face if you want to see if your hitting the club sweetspot.
customer_reviews.author: obi

customer_reviews.title: Like the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviews, it will clean the ball okay and I do not get a wet pocket. But, mostly moves the dirt around. You still need a towel to dry it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: You need one these. Stop making excuses and order today
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever invented!!!! And it stayed moist for 6+ hours. So please
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for any golfer
customer_reviews.text: Great way to keep the ball clean without getting your pocket soaked. I have used these for years and finally had to replace one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have used them for years now. I give them as gifts also.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why I don't see more of these on the course
customer_reviews.text: Seriously a great product! I have been using them for over 5 years. I play once or twice a week and I usually use two or three of these over the course of the summer. If you are a caddy, it is a great replacement for your towel and less cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Tjader Gerdom

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I’d rather use a sock. Whoever invented it clearly never even bothered trying to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Sarraraz III

customer_reviews.title: Great For Cleaning Golf Balls
customer_reviews.text: These work great to clean off your golf ball on the green. Wet on the inside, but dry on the outside. They do not get your pocket wet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product I have ordered 4 more to give to my playing partner at my club
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Stop thinking about, and buy it!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing fancy about this, ie cheap plastic, but it works. And it doesn't cost a lot, so no big deal if you lose it. Plus, two come in the package!
customer_reviews.author: gbpacker1921

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Purchase was a replacement for me and gift for golfer friend
customer_reviews.author: Iowa2019

customer_reviews.title: It works but bot great. The stiffness of the plastic makes it hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. It works but bot great. The stiffness of the plastic makes it hard to wrap around the ball to clean it. Better than nothing and for a few bucks not bad, I will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dangyankees

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable way to clean golf balls.
customer_reviews.text: Use to clean golf balls as many courses have removed the on course ball cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D Colaianni Jr

customer_reviews.title: Cleanest balls ever.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Fits neatly in my back pocket. Cleans a ball well. I am the gadget guy in my group, but everyone wants one of these.
customer_reviews.author: coad

customer_reviews.title: Item just as described and at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Item received was just as described on line and works well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: GregL

customer_reviews.title: Must have item. My friends use a small towel ...
customer_reviews.text: Must have item. My friends use a small towel or their cloth to clean the ball, but I can use this.
customer_reviews.author: Todobien

customer_reviews.title: Best ball washer to have.
customer_reviews.text: Best ball washer to have. I've gotten requests from other golfers asking where to find them.
customer_reviews.author: Billn

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to use
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my hands are too small for this but I prefer the one that is a little pocket that you put the ball into and rub. It's a little thicker but still fits into my front pocket nicely.
customer_reviews.author: minimalist

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my father to replace one that he had purchased years ago. It arrived quickly, was packaged well, and functions just as great as his first! Definitely a justified purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kaducky

customer_reviews.title: Best golf ball cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I loves these ball cleaners! I always have one in my pocket when I play. I don't have to carry big towels to clean the golf balls. It's wet inside so my pockets doesn't get wet.
customer_reviews.author: FlexArms

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: The recipient of this loved it and thought it was a great idea. She loved the name too. Its nice to keep your balls clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Ballzee ball cleaner
customer_reviews.text: They work, better than wiping the dirt on the palm of your hand then wiping that on your pants. nice and flat to keep in your pocket, just remember to not overdo it when you wet the pads with water.
customer_reviews.author: Petey

customer_reviews.title: Have used for two seasons.  Originals still working well.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted more for a new bag. Pocket stays dry unless you make it too wet. Cleans up easily with soap/water. Key is remembering to bring water and put in pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, now don't have to lick ball in the greens. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Barb E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what its supposed to do on the green, this will not replace a towel but is the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as advertised. Only negative is I misplace them often after each round. I keep extras in my bag now.
customer_reviews.author: Keith P.

customer_reviews.title: Golf Ballerina cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is not a very good product I guess that's why it's so in expensive. I guess the old adage you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Quick clean
customer_reviews.text: A good quick clean will give you a good striking surface for your putter. Ballzee is easy to use but can leak in your pocket if you wet it too much.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Sounds better than it is.
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations because of the write up that it received but honestly I find it easier to clean my ball with my towel. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: H.J.A.Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Ballzee cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball cleaner. So light, I sometimes forget I have it in my pocket. It's great for wiping off your club faces, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Clean balls are important
customer_reviews.text: Super handy for cleaning off the dirt on the greens. Doesn't get my leg wet in my pocket. I can't ask for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Young

customer_reviews.title: keeps shorts dry... but take a while ...
customer_reviews.text: keeps shorts dry ... but take a while to clean the ball cause the surface is smooth. and the ball is damp when finished. Nevertheless, it's more convenient than carrying a towel onto the green.
customer_reviews.author: GMichael

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The product is very thin and doesn't really dry or clean our ball. I was disappointed with the quality. The seller was prompt with shipping. Not their fault the product is sub par but maybe should look in to better quality replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Fleming

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: i thought I would use this more than I do. It's easier to just use my towel that I carry onto the green anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for carrying in your pocket to keep your golf ball clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product, can't grip the outside to scrub the ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, can't grip the outside to scrub the ball in the inside. Wouldn't do much good even if you could. Cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Collin McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: Because you can keep it your pocket and it stays wet and is non intrusive to carry I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kevin maughan

customer_reviews.title: Stop losing towels by leaving them on the green.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for the guy that hates dragging his towel around.
customer_reviews.author: Julian rodrigurz

customer_reviews.title: I love clean balls
customer_reviews.text: These do a great job of allowing me to quickly clean my balls without having to remember to lug around my cart towel...They're great for golf too.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoPete

customer_reviews.title: I wish the outside of them had a little better grip when your hands are dry
customer_reviews.text: I wish the outside of them had a little better grip when your hands are dry. I would recommend anyone to buy the small frogger towel instead of these. These do the job, but are way too small and don't think you are just going to roll your hand around and the ball will come out clean like the commercial.
customer_reviews.author: Korey L. Kaigle

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: it would be a better product if this was a pocket style. Good quality, but it's not functional well
customer_reviews.author: Hong Xiao

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy. The Ballzee does not keep pockets dry
customer_reviews.text: Not a good buy. The Ballzee does not keep pockets dry. It is not a good ball cleaner. There are similar and much better products on the market. Also I was double billed on the order, They did fix the issue but I wonder if I had not checked and put a stop on my credit card charge if they would have...
customer_reviews.author: Honesty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sucks, doesn't really clean the ball. If it was free, I still wouldn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Perillo

customer_reviews.title: works surprisingly well
customer_reviews.text: This ball cleaner does everything as advertised for me. I wet it at the beginning of the round, and keep it in my pocket. It cleans balls for the entire round and my pocket never gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: RCJL

product_meta.title: Ballzee Pocket Ball Towel, 2 Pack
product_meta.description: Safe and unique way to clean your ball on the green. Completely soak all moisture-lock scrubbing squares, wring out excess water and place flat in your pocket. Your pocket stays dry. Cleans clubs during play, washable and reusable.
feature_bullets: Safe & effective way to clean course chemicals, dirt and grass stains from your ball

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
